H74.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ner<SDBH:נֵר>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► army commander of king {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>} and his son {L:Ish-Bosheth<SDBH:אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת>}; father of {L:Jaasiel<SDBH:יַעֲשִׂיאֵל>}, officer in charge of his tribe, time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3097.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zeruiah<SDBH:צְרוּיָה>}, sister of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; ► chief of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}'s army

H5288.def: = a young male, ranging from childhood to adulthood; ► often in the service of other people; ≈ typically regarded as healthy and physically strong, but also lacking the experience and wisdom of the {L:older men<SDBH:זָקֵן>}

H7832.def: = action by which humans give expression to a friendly attitude, joy and amusement with the gestures and sounds that normally accompany it; ≈ this is normally regarded as a good thing, especially when done with restraint, whereas a lack of restraint is often associated with foolishness

H4557.def: = an oral or written account of something

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H378.def: = man, also known as {L:Ishvi<SDBH:יִשְׁוִי>}, whose real name probably was {L:Eshbaal<SDBH:אֶשְׁבַּעַל>}, but which was changed in order to remove any reference to {L:Baal<SDBH:בַּעַל>}; ◄ son of king {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► succeeded his father as king of the northern tribes until he was assassinated and {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} took his place

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

62.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H2388.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H6654.def: = side of a person's body, especially right above the hip; ► place where people sometimes carried their small children; ≈ location where one's body is unprotected and vulnerable

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1391.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► one of the four {L:Hivite<SDBH:חִוִּי>} cities that made a covenant with {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H7186.def: = state in which an object is firm and stable in shape

H74.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ner<SDBH:נֵר>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► army commander of king {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>} and his son {L:Ish-Bosheth<SDBH:אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת>}; father of {L:Jaasiel<SDBH:יַעֲשִׂיאֵל>}, officer in charge of his tribe, time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5062.def: = process by which a human's foot or both feet come in forcible contact with a stone or other object while travelling, ► which may result in stumbling and injury; ≈ usually used in a figurative way to denote sustaining any kind of hardship in life

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H1338.def: meaning unsure; possibly: = the first half of the day

H4266.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Gad<SDBH:גָּד>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Merari<SDBH:מְרָרִי>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; capital of kingdom of {L:Isboseth<SDBH:אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת>} son of {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>}

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H8672.def: = state in which a countable entity is nine in number

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6913.def: = place where one or more people are buried, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, stench and decay, uncleanness

H215.def: = process by which something reflects light; ≈ associated with well-being
